Fix: Apply correct Ora orange/beige colors from mockups

Corrected the color palette to match the official Ora mockups. The previous violet/teal scheme was incorrect.

Colors extracted from mockups:
- Primary: #F18D5C (Orange coral - logo, CTAs)
- Secondary: #F5C9A9 (Peach - accents)  
- Tertiary: #A8C5B0 (Sage green - Yoga category)
- Background: #F5EFE6 (Warm beige)
- Surface: #FFFBF8 (Warm white)

AuthScreen changes:
- Logo "ORA" in orange coral
- Added "Body Â· Mind Â· Soul" tagline
- Orange focus states on text fields
- Orange primary button
- Warm beige background
- Removed emoji for cleaner look

Theme changes:
- Complete palette replacement with warm tones
- Added category colors (Yoga, Pilates, Meditation, Breathing)
- Added gratitude card colors
- Dark mode adapted with warm brown tones
- Disabled dynamic color by default to preserve Ora identity
